title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit against income tax for certain charitable conservation contributions of land by small farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.
content: Private Land Conservation Tax Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a limited credit to an eligible farmer or rancher for a qualified conservation contribution. (2) treat such a farmer or rancher as an individual with respect to any such contribution with respect to the charitable contribution limit. And (3) expand, for estate tax purposes, the definition of land which may qualify for a conservation contribution.
